name: ⋆Hand of Greed
description:
🌟 FREE FOR A LIMITED TIME 🌟

Hand of Greed is a magical game that according to myth was created as a test of skill and agility for members of an Ancient Guild of Thieves.

Hand of Greed is an intense and remarkably unique adventure game that puts your reflexes, timing, and speed to the test in a magical, blade strewn gauntlet.

Avoiding everything from swinging guillotines to spiraling sawblades, you rack up wealth by grabbing ancient coins, valuable gems, and more!

- Featured as one of Gizmodo's "BEST APPS OF THE WEEK"
- Touch Arcade: "Each level is beautifully rendered, with the exceptionally crafted blades stealing the show.. It's a winning formula that is as simple as it is effective."
- Slide To Play: "We think Hand of Greed is easily worth every penny"
